DOC.brief_title: Comparison Between Budesonide Dexamethasone Treatments Respiratory Discomfort After Extubation Children
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator propose perform prospective , randomize , control double-blind non inferiority study enrol 70 child postextubation stridor . The population divide two group : group 1 receive inhale budesonide IV NS ( intravenous normal saline ) group 2 receive IV ( intravenous ) dexamethasone inhale normal saline . The study aim analyze compare ( I would say compare ) clinical effect use inhaled budesonide IV dexamethasone treatment postextubation stridor child admit pediatric intensive care unit Hospital Municipal M´Boi Mirim Hospital Albert Einstein .
